content.detailedDescription: The solid object was observed on west facing game camera used by border patrol to protect border between canada and united states. camera in near montana border. more exact details are hard to give. camera is a video game camera.
content.summary: Solid orb observed on border patrol camera

content.detailedDescription: I was going to bed around 2:15am when i looked out my bedroom window and saw what looked like bright white lights on a craft where one was blinking traveling 'very' fast and low from westerly going northerly and made no noise such as jet engine or propeller type craft!
content.summary: Bright lights like airplane but traveling very fast and no noise and low from west to north

content.detailedDescription: Upper story bed room with curtain open to catch breeze.  we were watching the tv program "alone".  i glanced out the window for whatever reason in time to catch an object that seemed fairly large in the empty desert sky. it had red flashing lights mainly and every once in awhile you would see a green or blueish flashing light.  at first i thought it was an airplane but the lights indicated that it was round. and big. the object was flying n/ne toward fallon nevada. i couldn't figure out why it was the wrong shape for a plane. we (my room mate and i) watched it until it was blocked from our view by another building.  nevada has a big empty sky so getting any kind of measurement of size is hard, but this thing had to be big it looked big even at the distance we were from it. thank you lisa
content.summary: Glanced out upper story window when i noticed a round object with flashing red lights around the exterior traveling north east.

content.detailedDescription: On august 13th a friend and i were in my driveway talking and i looked up in the sky and saw a light moving slowly through the sky.  it was slightly slower than an airplane you were observing, and slightly brighter than a star and there was no blinking.  my immediate thought was that it was a ufo, but i thought i had seen a ufo before and it turned out to be a plane, and i live near an airport, so i was skeptical. but i took a video just in case.  when i really thought it was more than a plane was when i went to watch the video the next morning, all that was there was a blank white picture that was apparently taken at the same time that i took the video.  the video was gone.
content.summary: I looked at the sky and saw a star-like light moving through the sky.

content.detailedDescription: While at work i stepped out to stretch my legs i observed the triangle just off to the south west of my post.At approximately 45deg above the horizon the object did not move,make a sound or do anything accept sit there.It was above the clouds with the moon 15 deg to the south east and above the top point of the triangle. did not observe any stars inside the three points.Approximate length per side using a 12inch ruler at arms length each side was 11.5 inches from point to point.I was able to get a digital photo using a nv-100 night vision monocular and will include it after i download.
content.summary: Very large triangle

content.detailedDescription: Came out of movies around 8:30-9:00 pm on 13 august and noticed a very large dark cloud and what seemed like heat lightning as there wasn't any rain.  pulled out cell phone a snapped a picture and immediately noticed three blue lights hovering in cloud, appeared to be triangle shaped.  at first tried to rationalize it as a plane until i noticed a plane to the right of the cloud which was significantly smaller.  i immediately believed this to be a ufo.  posted to facebook to get others opinion.  i didn't linger after the picture was shot, i lost sighting by leaving area.
content.summary: Came out of the movies noticed a strange very dark cloud low to the ground and possible heat lightning, no rain in area. snapped a picture and walked to our car and left for home.

content.detailedDescription: Observed up to 16 various size blinking flashing lighted objects in western sky.It was about 10:30pm est. i went out to lower umbrella after storm warnings. observed a triangle made up of 3 bright lighted objects with flashing colors witch stayed stationary for at least the 30 minutes i observed. smaller lights began to appear outside of the 3 main lights and also to the area above the top light.
content.summary: Observed in western sky 16 or more.Various size flashing,blinking objects in a triangle shape 3 at first. then various size or smaller lights streaked across sky to 3 larger shapes in triangle formation, and all were stationary for at least 30 minutes i w

content.detailedDescription:
On friday 8/12 913pm my husband and i were outside in our backyard and we noticed a bright light which was  a round sphere that descend in the se sky , and moved side to side on descend, but then blinked out of before it fell below skyline. it was not a plane, or helicopter. we both sit outside frequently in the summer, and see planes flying over to pdx. 

this object was brighter than a regular plane, more circular.. it was a round illuminated globe in the sky that blinked out of existence as it descended.  maybe it was some kind of craft that we are not familir with?
content.summary: We saw a round sphere descend, and move sideto side on descend, but then blinked out of existence before it fel bleow skyline

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to have a smoke. looked up and saw the moon was still visible. saw an object flying from my right to left. solid white and moving fast. occasionally it would dip up and down extremely fast. like too fast. nothing i've ever seen benn in my 18 1/2 years of military service. but i'm no pilot. just seemed too fast!
content.summary: Looked up at the moon and saw something!

content.detailedDescription: I lived in wv at the time of the sighting i was on my way to work the moon was still visible just under the moon was a very large ball grey in color it was'nt moving just siting ther i continued to work once there i call my local tv station call wvva and asked if anyone reported seeing anything under the moon theri report was it's a reflection from pluto from our sun to my-self i dont think so i' can-not explain what it was but for sure it was no reflection
content.summary: A gray large ball under the moon around 1/2 the size of the moon

content.detailedDescription: I didn't get a chance to review this footage until aug 14. although this object appears to be hovering, it moves slightly side-to-side, was not visible by naked eyesight. i film in ultraviolet, which makes the constant color change even more dramatic. i play the footage for a bit, at normal speed, but speed it by 250% because of the length of this event. i provide close-ups that seem to have a definite 3-dimensional feel, but the ball is in constant flux, reminding me of foo-fighter stories. edge detection was done, as well as inverting color. the time and date stamp are correct, and i was present physically, although did not see anything at the time. object appears to be present even before i lock the tripod into place. i've also provided the last clip in slow motion, zoomed and sharpened, it seems to multiple bright areas as it disappears, or moves off. a very strange, very beautiful event i felt i had to share.
content.summary: Spikey plasma ball multi-colored

content.detailedDescription:
1. camping outside my house 2.My wife pointed to it. 3. i thought it was a star. 4. it brighten at least 4 times brighter then the north star then stopped and hovered blinking blue and red lights 
then it lower its light intensity and then it changed direction and just faded out right in front of me. 5. i felt vilified in my belief in something more then human life. i
scrambled for my camera, which later was a mistake because days later when i started reviewing the footage i was visited by something that had only sound, feelings and demonstrations of power only. 
6.As i said earlier it just disappeared right in front of me like it was still there but no longer wanted to be seen. and you can't ask my wife either because for the past 6 years she's been afraid of the recurrences. 
i have so much footage that i had to put it in my alternate server because it keeps disappearing off my computer drives and the web, where i live is way to slow or something to handle such large files of what's left of the 
footage i have accumulated. i have footage i haven't even reviewed yet.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sometimes they follow where i go on clear nights don't know why

content.detailedDescription:
(i wish to remain anonymous at this time, but i am promoting this phenomenon and may change my mind in the near future.) 

i was a participant at contact in the desert - 2016. on the night of june 4,i was attending the night vision skywatch at the orion lookout point. the facilitator was allowing attendees to use her night vision goggles, but i had brought my 7 x 50 binoculars. i saw a number of objects through the goggles that could qualify as et spacecraft, but these were not included the more definitive sighting(s) that took place from about 10:20 pm to 10:43 pm.

as a long-time star-gazer, i was looking up at the night sky with my own eyes, enjoying the cloudless clear desert sky when about 8 to 10 glowing objects appeared in the northwest. they were comparable in brightness to the planets mars and jupiter, which were visible in the sky (along with saturn) that evening, but probably a little brighter. they were very easy to spot with the naked eye. they made no sound. the first wave of ships was not in a clear formation. they flew across the sky in a scattered array. i did not count the exact number because i focused on some of them with my binoculars to discern individual craft details.

the following text is an excerpt from my journal entry that i made on june 7th, 2016:

i could make out details with my binocs. the main swarm included 8 - 10 teardrop or oval shaped ships of colors from white to red, blue, amber, purple, and green. i could tell they were spinning in my binocs. when a laser shined near them, they would flash light back in a crescent shape on the ship. the blue ones (2) flashed white: 


(color drawing of blue ship)


the white ones (2) had a gray discoloring or highlight:


(color drawing of white ship)

they all rotated clockwise as they moved across our field of vision from left (north-west) to right (north-east).

the circumpolar constellations were easily visible. cassiopeia was on the north-east horizon, rising.

three flew by in formation after the first group appeared. these were blue and purple. i recall 2 blues, and one purple. i don't remember the color the purple one emanated. 

the last one was an emerald green, "star," which was alone. diffuse green irregular splotches of light appeared above it as it flew by. 

(color drawing of green ship)

it was smaller than the others. it curved away from us as it flew by. none of the ships made any sound.

i couldn't count them all, but i thought that there were about 10. a woman i spoke to later said she counted 8.

(color drawing of red ship) - i don't remember the highlight coloring (white?)

the purple one seemed "out of focus."  like a (point) source of light (unfocused). it appeared grainy. it was closer to a perfect circle in shape. i don't recall a highlight or a crescent.

(color drawing of purple ship) - 1 only

i didn't get a close look at the amber ones. they were in the first part of the swarm, and i moved my binocs to look at the ones in formation. i didn't finish counting them before moving my binocs to the ships flying in formation.


i also saw multiple possible ships through the night vision goggles. i saw a few, "power up," and, "power down" as they moved in straight lines, well above the horizon.

(drawing of ship waves, the northern horizon, polaris and cassiopeia.)

(end of excerpt)

i had initially thought that the time between the first and second waves was about 30 seconds. the time between the second and third waves seemed to be about 2 minutes.

i did not see precisely how the ships disappeared, except for the final green one. i could tell that its path veered away from us. it disappeared over the north-east horizon, flying toward the constellation cassiopeia, flashing as it receded. i was moving my binoculars between ships, and they just kept flying to the north-east. strangely enough, i don't recall how any of the ships in the first two waves left my field of vision.

i could not make a reliable estimation of the sizes or distances of the ships. i saw no effect of their lights on the ground.

i texted a friend of mine who was at the event, in another location.
my first text was at 10:30 pm. it read:

multiple sightings at orion lookout. nany colors. amazing!!!Get down here!!!

10:31 pm: many colors. (corrected my spelling)

10:43 pm: at least 10. lost count. from north west.

10:44 pm: another one. or two.

it thus appears that about 15 minutes passed between the second and third waves. i took photographs of my texts, and the time stamps on them. i'm trying to save them for later reference.

when i first saw them, i was certain that they were et spacecraft. i had seen plenty of planes that evening, as well as all my life. i did wonder about this, but the protocol included shining powerful hand-lasers at them. we were told that it's illegal to do this to airplanes (it blinds the pilots). 

if they had been airplanes, the entire conference would have been shut down, according to the facilitator. i could see the beams of the lasers as i observed the ships in my binocs, as well as their flashed responses.
over the decades, i've seen planes through binoculars and telescopes at day and night, and these nothing like anything remotely resembling jets or planes. 

i have been star-gazing since the '70s, and i know how to identify objects seen through optical instrumentation.

of course, i was excited. a shout went up from the crowd. we were heard all over the joshua tree retreat center. i had participated in observing exercises, and have seen objects that could be regarded as et craft, but this was my first definitive experience in these matters. it was far and away, the best part of the conference. 

i hadn't planned on staying out there that long. i had expected to go to the party where the conference presenters were hanging out. but i enjoyed the beauty of the view so much, that i was in no hurry to leave the observation point. i talked to one of the assistants, and she was impressed with me for having my own equipment, and invited me to stay with her to watch the sky. they were rotating people through due to the limited number of night vision goggles. i had left my telescope in my car because of the distance i would have had to carry it - i didn't want to risk dropping and breaking it. apparently, i had made the right decision to just bring the binoculars. 

i was told that there was a film crew at the sighting, and that they were able to get footage of the sighting. i'm trying to follow-up with people who were there.

this experience was a life-changer. i ate a late dinner with the facilitator and some of the assistants. they shared a number of veteran stories of sightings and experiences with the big names in the ufo community. i didn't want the evening to end. i bought some new equipment to better observe the sky and look for more et spacecraft. i am certain that i will see them.

i informed other people in the ufo community about my experience, and am in the process of taking a larger role in search and contact preparation activities.


(i'll include scans of the drawings later. i've run out of time. sorry!)
content.summary: Night mass ufo sighting of 10 multi-colored spinning egg-shaped glowing vechicles in 3 waves

content.detailedDescription:
It was 1986 flying out of bermuda on military patrol.  just after take off i was conducting an inspection of the acft. when i entered the cockpit to report it was full of very bright white light.
the pilots and engineer were in a stupper and i had to screen at the pilot to level out. i had to push the yoke forward to level it out or we have stalled and crashed. after i felt they were ok i went back down the back of the plane. each crewman were in a stupper and confused.  i ensured each was back to normal. i heard the pilot call center and asked if they showed any radar contact. they said no, and would you like to report.  he said no.  this was a classic ww2 foo fighter. it circled our plane as we took off at full pwr so it matched our accent and speed.  thank goodness it did not effect me or .??  we continued the patrol but we were looking every for anything. we landed and all got drunk.  two days later i had a air traffic controller come to the chiefs club and got him in a talk-a-tive mood and asked if that stuff happened a lot.  he stated every third or forth nite.  that was the only time it happened to us and we flew out of there for years.
content.summary: Just after takeoff from bermuda for patrol sighted a foo fighter.

content.detailedDescription:
Last october 2015, i was looking at the stars in the sky and observed several bright stars moving back and forth and changing direction.
on every clear night i have taken pictures video and still pictures.
at first i would zoom my camera x16 and the pictures show a blue disk
object. wthin, the last month i have observed 4-5 bright light in the sky directly over head my house. last night 8-13-16, i took a 5 still pictures 3 videos of each bright lights (9:00pm), i see pig faces coming out (canon a590is camera in zoom x16) of the worm hole portal star gate in the sky. i believe that the bright lights are at the elevation between 150,000-300,000 feet.
content.summary: 4 bright lights in sky over my house. each one has two or three pig faces coming out of the worm hole portal star gate

content.detailedDescription: A paranormal group visited me on the first week of august because i did not know where to turn.  i explained to them i was experiencing occult influences in the form of entities that were able to control my thoughts and talk to me with my own voice.  it has been going on for seven years.  i thought it was a mixture of alien and supernatural but was not sure and needed help.  i told them i did experience seeing a ufo at least twice.  i saw one fly over my home around seven years ago when this all began, it was very large, about the size of my house, and flew off extremely fast when i saw it for about a second there over my house.  the second event was around five months ago and it flew left, then flew right, stayed there for a short while.  i showed no interest because of my symptoms and it disappeared.  i have been guided into believing the control over my mind is robotic and from implants.  they have mentioned reptilian to me.  i saw a grey once in my room but am not sure what to consider actual because i know they like to trick and manipulate.  the word illuminati comes up a lot.  i have been getting attacked both mentally and physically.  when the paranormal group came they tested me for emf signals, and i was emitted them from the left side of my ear and my arm.  the group has it recorded on a camera video phone.  they tried reaching out to you and i was told to personally submit a report.  i can ask for the video of the emf when you reply to this if you need it, i am unsure as to the procedure you take.  i have been struggling and life has been very hard for me with all of these attacks.  the attacks include pains in the head, chest pains, unwanted sexual feelings, heating of the body, loss of memory, feeling drained and tired, being kept awake at night, altering electronics such as music im listening to, nausea, and i need help.  i have a mri scheduled for monday and dermatologist scheduled in late september for this bump in my arm but i am afraid of ethereal implants which they have mentioned and other types of influence that i am unaware of how to get rid of.  additional evidence such as video of emf signatures can be provided i just need to ask the paranormal group to send it to me.
content.summary: This is my experience with entities and implants i will describe actual experience with ufo in detail

content.detailedDescription:
One late night in june of 2013 i went to the store around the corner for a beverage to share with my wife ,it was a quite night with clear skyes and no over cast reported.While driving no more than five hundred yards i saw a flash of pink light with the sound of thunder.Icould only think what in the world was that.I proceeded to dive while looking up to the sky very puzzled about that flash of light.My only thought was to hope nothing is going on at the power plant nearby.
on my way back home,on the same street where i saw the light  i could see my house in the distance and was vocused in on an red object that seemed to be hovering very close to home.As i got closer i said to myself what the heck is that over my house. i then parked my car and grabbed my drink, got out and staired at this glowing beautiful ball of light.It was maby two hundred feet directly over the top of my home.After one minute i ran into the house saying something is outside in the air over the house.
 my family did not want to take a look or believe me because im always playing around with them.My daughter finally got up and came out side and to her surprise,she also was in awe and completely shocked.We started taking photos with our camera and then the activity started.There waere several orbes launching from out of no where,they all moved in the same direction away from home towards the nuclear power plant high in the sky.These orbes were clustered up togeather like little red stars in the night sky. it was about eight orbes total.When there wasent any more orbes  launching i ran in the house to get my cam recorder and when i came back out one last orbe showed up .It was bright white.The others where plasma orange.I was able to record as long as i could before going off track because is was amazed and not focused anymore.This last white orbe took the same path high in the sky and joined the others,then they vanished with the snap of your finger.
 several years has past and im just getting to where i feel as if i should show and tell my experience after seeing that this is going on world wide.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw pink flash of lightning and minutes later orbs appeared out of thin air

content.detailedDescription: Same as short description
content.summary: Went outside early morning and took several pictures in sky   one looks like triangle ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and myself were sat stationary in our car, looking through the glass roof, we noticed what appeared to be either a satalite, or space station slowly move from left to right, my daughter said it was a star, i told her it was more a satalite, as it was flashing brightly, but was far to high to be a plane, we watched it go by slowly for at least half an hour, as it went behind a cloud, i noticed a bright red light appear, i said to my daughter what is that, as quick as it appeared, the red light, ( which seemed to be 3 round red lights in the shape of a triangle) also went behind a small cloud, but never came out the opposite side, we looked everywhere to see if it had turned or gone a different way, but there was no sign of it.
we looked to see the satalite slowly disappear behind a building, i moved the car a bit further down the road, but still could not see the red object anywhere, with that my wife and son came out, so we headed home, as i explained what we had just seen, they said it was just a plane or something, as they don't believe what we had seen, this happened exactly at 19:40 exactly on the 14/8/2016.
content.summary: Watching what looked like a satalite, a bright red coloured object appeared, went behind a cloud then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
This is to supplement your active investigation into the bakersfield, ca. ufo incident of last week. i am skilled in photo restoration and decided to further investigate the published photo of this incident. after screen-capturing the published photo, i increased the resolution and focus several times to reveal the actual pilot of this craft. the pilot is wearing an orange skull-cap. this helpful location hint may be needed since my super-long and extreme-digital zoom of this photo is, as expected, not studio quality. 

though at first the pilot appears to be human, closer inspection reveals a rather oddly shaped (camera) left-eye. the other eye is behind what appears to be an ocular navigation type eyepiece (triangular and silver).

this incident also involved two ufo's at a higher altitude. i have not yet resolved those objects in that published photo.

i understand that my version of this photo is unique and copyright-able, yet i authorize mufon to use use this in any way to assist them in this ongoing investigation and as far as "fair-use" policies will allow.

if my extreme zoom is helpful, i would deeply appreciate photo-credit as well as a link to mufon's final report on this incident.

in service,

donald p. pineda
content.summary: Screen-captured bakersfield ufo photo and resolved it until ufo pilot revealed as shown.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were running an errand.  he was driving.  i sat in the passenger side front seat.  we stopped at a stoplight at a crossroads at cornhusker and 36th.  i glanced right and noticed a sphere moving smoothly and steadily eastward.  it was pretty big and moving, and reflective, which is why i notied it.  i examined it to see if it might be a plane, but that was not possible.  i wondered if it might be a balloon but it was moving in too smooth a fashion and struck me as mechanical.  i thought "drone" but saw no evidence of propeller or propulsion beyond what seemed a slight heat shimmer behind the object.  i grabbed my iphone 6 and took a shot or two as i told my son to look.  he saw what i saw.  we understood we were seeing a ufo of some kind but neither of us was especially upset or excited.  we took it matter-of-factly and discussed it minimally.  we had no clue what they could be.  we saw that there were two objects moving in a steady, smooth way eastward but the following object seemed to adjust position, lowering itself, then speeding slightly, until their speeds once again synced up.  when the light changed, we turned left and drove away from the objects.
content.summary: Stopped at crossroads red light, glanced right, spotted ufo north, took phone picture, noticed a second in the shot, light changed, we left.

content.detailedDescription:
As usual on saturdays i was house cleaning. i went out back to the deck for a rest, facing east i sat down and put my feet up as i leaned back to rest. 

what first made me notice the object was that as i was leaning back, looking ahead at the sky the object came into my right side peripheral view. a guesstimate is that the object was about maybe two and a half avenues east of my location and no more than one thousand feet high. it would have been underneath any cloud cover if there had been clouds.

my initial thought was the object though unusual likely had to be a weather balloon. i always presumed weather balloons were a single ball and for some reason thought they had connected a few balloons together. 

the object was actually a number of very bright white solid balls or spheres (referred to as the object) moving along a south to north course across the sky. this is the same path as the avenues which more or less begin at the river which is a boundary between canada and the us.

during this period, at any given time and as though slightly blowing in the breeze, some spheres moved closer together; moving further apart; or moving slightly upwards or downwards; and, a number of times the spheres seemed to all have pushed together forming the shape of cocktail sausage. although not detectable, these spheres appeared equidistantly tethered together, maybe about an eight foot circumference; and, moved along a fixed horizontal, south to north course. i did not detect any type of mechanical or other noise coming from the object.

the computer was just inside the back door and i quickly googled weather balloons. from all the images the single ball thought seemed correct. i thought it odd that the object was traveling on a straight even path and knew enough that even though it was not windy out there are air currents that would cause a balloon of any sort to be tossed around in most if not all directions.  with my binoculars i went outside again. 

i called my roommate outside to have a look. she said to google it and i asked her, but google what. she said google an unidentified flying jellyfish as the movement of the individual spheres reminded her how jellyfish would move. this movement was the only resemblance to jellyfish  the object was clearly a number of more or less solid white balls or spheres, seemingly equidistantly loosely tethered together.

during this time, i called a family member who lived across the railway tracks and a couple blocks further down the avenue. i asked him what a weather balloon looks like. i asked him to watch for the object as at that point it was to the left (north) and past the railway tracks. i presumed it would continue on as it had been doing for at least the past 20-30 minutes. i went back in to do my housework.

for reference, there was just one house between my home and the railway track. the railway track comes into town from the east at maybe about a 35 degree angle.  

between about two to three and a half hours later i was on the phone with a friend and told her about what i had seen. she asked if i had taken pictures which i had not as i thought it was most likely a weather balloon. she asked if the object was still there.

i went outside, looked up and the object was hovering above the railway tracks. my friend said to take a picture which knocked me into action. i ran inside, grabbed my camera and back out again, just seconds. the object was almost out of view, it had to have shot straight up to about the height jets fly and then out of sight. 

stepping back onto the deck to see the object just hovering and then again with camera in hand was when the curiosity of the experience turned to eeriness. there was no way to put this into context. i had the strange thought the object was aware of me and that i was about to take pictures. my friend laughed and said this sounds like a fish tale.

at that time, my perception that unusual objects in the sky were typically disc shaped and occurred at night. over the past years i have watched television shows discussing these types of experiences or sightings. in the past week i viewed a number of shows that prompted me to present my experience. the last straw in this was during a show where some people had been discussing their daytime sighting and one of them said to go in to get their camera and take pictures. when that person went back outside with their camera, the object had shot out of view.
content.summary: The object was a number of pure white solid, same sized spheres; equidistantly connected together by undetectable flexible tethers having independent movements from the central point.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a pulsating ball that changed direction and colors in the south. it was going straight acrossed the sky then backed up and then descended out of sight. i know what a plane and helicopter and drone looks like at night...This was not one of those!!  i have seen many of these things, but am very hesitant to tell anyone because they think i'm seeing things or lying. this thing is not normal air traffic!!!!
content.summary: A pulsating ball that changed direction and colors descending.

content.detailedDescription:
I honestly believe that this is one of the most amazing videos ever recorded...From a scientific stand point...There are so much knowledge that could come from this video!

i heard thunder outside but it was a beautiful blue sky...So i went outside to try and tape it...I had my phone above my head taping and i was not looking through the phone...I was looking at the actual cloud and saw a flash of light...First thought was obviously lightning...And it ran through my head that was close...Probably shouldn't be out here as i braced for the thunder...Which never came...And i thought that to be odd considering how close it was...Not even a few seconds later did it come...So i looked at the phone and noted the time so i could check it later...I wondered if i caught it on tape or if the flash i saw was something else...When i saw the video ...I was amazed...So i put it on the computer and thats when i saw the other black object fly by before the flash of light...Its sooo fast...When i slowed it down on the computer enough to see it...Its actually skipping frames ...Thats fast!  so  i put it on my tv and with the volume up...You actually hear the object wiz by...As well as the light make the same sound! so i'm not sure if the light is an object too! i mean you can actually close  your eyes and hear it without watching it....Absolutely amazing!!! back to back. i had no idea what i actually caught on tape until i viewed it...I can't imagine most people being about to see that in real time with just the human eye...It was too fast...Like i said...I saw a flash of light and then doubted it because i heard no thunder and where there is lighting there is thunder...I just feel overwhelmed about what i have on video....
in the video...The object comes from the left at incredible speed and goes slightly up...Followed by a line of light that goes straight across the screen and appears to also come from the left...Both make a noise of something swooshing by.....Its clearly coming from the objects as they pass by...Just amazing!
content.summary: Aextreamly fast moving object followed by a flash  line of light that made the same sound

content.detailedDescription: Was stargazing through the window due to reports my daughter had seen a strange purple light in the countryside. my wife spotted something interesting.  at first glance i thought it was a star as it did not appear to move, and shimmered as stars do.  at further inspection it had blue, red, white, yellow, green lights that seemed to emanate from within the object also at different locations on the object. i remembered that i had a 35x spotting scope.  took it out and pointed to the object revealed it was far away as the light was shimmering, did not have a distinct outline.  it looked to be a litter smaller than the largest planet you would see at night.  at times it had horizontal colored lines going through it, but constant pattern: blue, white, green, red, yellow in that order top down.  all of a sudden the pattern would change to random spaghetti-like curved lines with same colors, but different pattern.  next it would change back to horizontal lines, again same colors, but different pattern than before.  started out about 16 degrees above the horizon, almost due northwest then over the course of 40 minutes or so drifted a few degrees down and moved slightly north until below treeline.  i thought it could have been a drone with lights, but the duration and constancy of the velocity of drift made me think otherwise, and of course, the bizarre lighting patterns would be hard to duplicate with a drone.
content.summary: Multi-colored object slowly descending

content.detailedDescription: Cloud like fog with about 8 lights hovering above river
content.summary: Hovering above river with cloud like fog lights got slowly brigter then dimmed

content.detailedDescription: I was jogging in orlando's colonialtown neighborhood with my husband, who was riding a bike, around 6:30 p.M. saturday, aug. 13, when he pointed out two super-shiny cylindrical objects with gray bands in the middle traveling slowly -- like a cessna's speed -- in tandem from southeast to northwest over winter park, probably 10,000 feet high. he stopped his bike and i stopped running to look at the cylinders. moments later, a third came from the south in the vicinity of orlando international airport and traveled generally the same path, then a fourth. we watched them travel about cessna speed to the northern horizon, and continued on our bike ride and run. about five minutes later, we saw a fifth and sixth cylinder, these higher up, and what appeared to be a shiny or glowing sphere right at the edge of sight maybe 30,000 or 40,000 feet up over the cape canaveral area to the east. upon arriving home at 7 p.M., i grabbed my iphone and binoculars to observe what appeared to be two more cylindrical objects again traveling south to north over east orlando, but higher -- maybe 20,000 or 30,000 feet. these are the two i took video and photos of. i'm unsure whether these were in the same class as the fist six cylinders as they appeared to have a red tailfin and possibly stubby wings, but if these were jets, they looked unlike any i have ever seen. the first six, especially, did not have any visible wings or tailfins, and one emitted a burst of vapor for a few seconds.
content.summary: 6 to 8 shiny, jet-length cylinders plus one sphere drifted over orlando after major storm

content.detailedDescription:
Medicine hat alberta (canada) at about 1:50 am 14 aug 2016. was out looking for shooting stars as a meteor shower had passed days prior. i saw what appeared to be a sat, however it quickly and rapidly changed directions multiple times and returned in the direction it came. was difficult to see due to light pollution however from experience i can say for sure it was no helicopter or plane. it couldn't have even been a drone as i'm  sure the object was in lower orbit, or wherever sats are.

all in all was neat to see.
content.summary: Looked like a sat, shape size color(light) but then it moved around rapidly

content.detailedDescription:
1. at 5:58 pm august 13, 2016, i was driving down telephone rd before wells rd., the east end of ventura. i saw a large dark disk in the sky about 45 - 50 degrees from horizon, the disk appeared larger than an airplane would appear. as i came closer to wells rd the line of sight of the disk went behind some trees.

2. the disk was not moving in the sky, was larger compared to an airplane, 1.5 inches wide, seemed close.

3. it was definitely not an airplane, it was a ufo.

4. i was looking at the disk for 20 - 25 seconds while i was driving, it did not move in the sky, and was very large.

5. i wanted to document the disk and take a picture with my cell, i had to turn, i did go back, i had an appointment, i thought i would look for something on the internet when i got home at 10:00. 

i have seen other ufo's in the sky from the park on kimbell rd. on the east end of ventura, maybe 3 years ago, high up in the sky, far away, it changed direction abruptly, maybe 100 degrees and moved fast. 

6. line of sight went behind some trees,
content.summary: Driving down telephone rd,  saw dark disk in the sky, 1" to 1 1/2", could not take a picture, disk disappear behind trees

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling south on 76th st, leaving the thiensville area, at about 8:30pm, when i approached the stop light at mequon rd., which goes east/west.  i happened to look up at the sky, and to my right, which would be west, observed eight star-like objects traveling in perfect formation, in a northeast direction, for about 10 minutes.  i did not notice any flashing red or green lights, so i knew that they couldn't be planes.  and, i don't, think they were weather balloons, as i think they were too low in the sky.  i also observed a brighter star-like object, which was somewhat lower in the sky, but don't know what happened to that object.  the eight dimmer white lights, as stated above, were all traveling in perfect formation, in a northeast direction.  i lost sight of the objects, as i continued driving south on 76th st.
content.summary: Eight star-like objects observed, traveling in perfect formation, in northeast direction, near mequon/brown deer area at 8:30pm
